messages.title: Fighting against hard Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union. That's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats will invest an extra £6bn a year in our NHS & Social Care system.

messages.title: Opposing school cuts
messages.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Rushcliffe. Schools across Nottinghamshire are set to lose £44 million from their budgets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocating for Britain's membership of the European Union and ensuring people have a say on the final Brexit deal.
Planned additional investment in health and care services with a £6bn annual injection into the NHS & Social Care system.
Challenging the Conservative Party's approach to local school funding, aiming to prevent a £44 million budget loss for Nottinghamshire schools.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union. That's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
issues.education: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Rushcliffe. Schools across Nottinghamshire are set to lose £44 million from their budgets.
issues.health: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats will invest an extra £6bn a year in our NHS & Social Care system.

images.caption: Jayne Phoenix in medical setting with health workers.
